original_text: God wants to keep you for himself. And that is what I want too. I have brought you to Christ, like a pure bride who marries one husband. I want you to be pure and to belong only to him. Corinthians 10 Corinthians 12
korean_text: 내가 하나님의 열심으로 너희를 위하여 열심을 내노니 내가 너희를 정결한 처녀로 한 남편인 그리스도께 드리려고 중매함이로다 그러나 나는

sentences.original_text: God wants to keep you for himself.
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님은 당신을 자신을 위해 지키고 싶어 하십니다.

sentences.original_text: And that is what I want too.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그것이 제가 원하는 것이기도 합니다.

sentences.original_text: I have brought you to Christ,
like a pure bride who marries one husband.
I want you to be pure
and to belong only to him.
